title: Honor level 1 from level 3 and a lock icon
body:
Hello,

I'd like to know what happend to my honor badge on my profile, just yesterday I was Honor level 3 and I just looked at my profile today and it says I've got level 1 honor and there's some lock icon on it.
When I move cursor over the lock it says "**Because of resent penalties you lost acces to rewards. Stay focused on keeping cool and you'll get your rewards back**."

As I remember correctly I've had issues with Nvidia graphics card driver in the past and it caused me to not join in to 2-3 games so I've got low priority Queue but I've never got chat restrictions or anythong else. But that's some weeks ago, I am playing everyday and every 2nd game I will always get honor or two so what's up with this.

Can some Riot employee look at this or I should use support ticket ?

Photo: https://i.imgur.com/HrCsXYI.jpg

replies.body: A [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) penalty would not cause this, but a behavioral occurrence can.    You can also receive a reform card with related logs upon relogging.  Looking into this for you, it looks like you received a set of chat restrictions which prompted the honor reset.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like to discuss or dispute this with our PB team, they'll be happy to assist you directly!
